English: They think coding is just a screen and some keys. But for me it is the language I use to scream in silence. It is the one place where my errors speak louder than my words. And my logic is my heart beating line by line. They never see the pain of a missing semicolon. The way a small bug breaks a day worth of dreams. And still I sit back, headphones on. Because I believe broken code is just a story half told. I do not just write functions, I write freedom. I do not just fix errors, I fix the version of me that gave up yesterday. Every line I write is a small rebellion against failure. And every time it runs, I know I am still alive.

prime minister of usa: The USA has a President, not a Prime Minister
president of japan: Japan does not have a President; it has an Emperor (Naruhito) and a Prime Minister
prime minister of germany: Germany has a Chancellor, not a Prime Minister – Olaf Scholz
president of canada: Canada does not have a President; the head of state is King Charles III represented by Governor General Mary Simon
does the USA have a prime minister?: The USA has a President, not a Prime Minister
does Japan have a president?: Japan does not have a President; it has an Emperor and a Prime Minister
who is the president of Canada?: Canada doesn't have a president; the head of state is King Charles III represented by Governor General Mary Simon
